meanings.definition: Resembling a ladder in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The treehouse had a ladderlike staircase leading up to it.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf had ladderlike shelves for easy access to all the books.
meanings.sent3: The ladderlike pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel taller.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a ladderlike braid, cascading down her back.
meanings.sent5: The clouds formed a ladderlike formation in the sky, reaching towards the horizon.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or appearance of a ladder.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar moved in a ladderlike motion, inching along the branch.
meanings.sent2: The building had a ladderlike design with multiple levels stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent3: The ladderlike stripes on the cat's fur made it look like a tiny zebra.
meanings.sent4: The shadows cast by the fence created a ladderlike pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The vines grew in a ladderlike fashion, climbing up the side of the house.
